mapper.insert: insert into t_exam_classroom_use (id, useClrId, useClrTime, useThrough, useClrName) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{useClrId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{useClrTime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{useThrough,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{useClrName,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: select id, useClrId, useTime, useClrTime, useAuditTime, useThrough, useClrName from t_exam_classroom_use
